announcements.summary:
New missions up to RANK500!
The rewards up to RANK 200 are more luxurious!
announcements.title: RANK Up Mission!!

bodies.description:
*If you have completed the mission before 
the renewal on 12/18 (Tue) and have already 
received "Dragon Stones" etc., you can receive 
other new rewards from various missions.

"Kaiou-sama Mission" even for 
users who have already reached Rank 500.

{color: #FFFF00}Indefinite period{color}

*Please note that the campaign
contents and period may change
without notice.

Thank you for your continued support
for "Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle".

announcements.summary:
Discounted Gacha, Limited to 3 times!!
Recruit the unit in the "All Out" category!
announcements.title:
"All Out"
Category Gasha held!

bodies.description:
{size: 25}{outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00}● About Extra "coins"{color}{outline}{size}
Every time you use 5 Dragon Stones 
in this Gasha, you can get 1 "Gasha Coin"!!

The acquired "Gacha Coin" can be
exchanged for the character at the
treasure exchange!

Check the number of required 
"Gacha Coins" and details of the
character at the Exchange shop!

*Various "coins" that you earn
will be sent to the gift box.
*For other details about various "coins", please 
refer to the separately announced news about 
various "coins" that can be acquired as a bonus of Gacha".

{size: 25}{outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00}● Holding period{color}{outline}{size}
2020/6/30(火) 14:00
2020/6/30(Tue) 14:00
 ~ 2020/7/16(Thu) 16:59!!

*Some characters that do not 
belong to the "All Out" category
are also included in the banner
but unfeatured.

nThank you for your continued support for
"Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle".

announcements.summary:
Ten old elder kails will appear in the once-only 
Let's raise the special move Lv!!
announcements.title: A Mysterious Ritual Gacha Held!

bodies.description:
{center:begin}{size: 25}{outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00}A gasha that appears only once!{outline}{color}
{outline: #FFFFFF, 2}{color: #6600FF}Ten elder kais appear in consecutive gacha!!{color}{outline}{size} 

If you select [Mysterious Ritual] Elder Kai as your opponent
uring training, the {color: #FFFF00} SA Lv will be increased by 1{color}!!

If the Special Move Lv goes up, it will also benefit the potential release!!
The route at the lower right of the potential system
can be used according to the {color: #FFFF00} Special Move Lv{color}!!{center}

*This gacha is only a multi-summon gacha,
there is no single gacha.
*If you summon a special continuous gacha once,
it will not be displayed on the gasca screen.
*The character that appears from this gacha
is [Mysterious Ritual] Elder Kai only.

{size: 25}{outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00}● About Extra "coins"{color}{outline}{size}
You can get 10 "Gacha Coins" by pulling
consecutive Gacha with this Gacha!!

The acquired "Gacha Coin" can be
exchanged for the character at the
treasure exchange!

Check the number of required 
"Gacha Coins" and details of the
character at the Exchange shop!

*Various "coins" that you earn
will be sent to the gift box.
*For other details about various "coins", please 
refer to the separately announced news about 
various "coins" that can be acquired as a bonus of Gacha".

{size: 25}{outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00}● Holding period{color}{outline}{size}
2020/6/30(Tue) 14:00
 ~ 2020/7/16(Thu) 16:59!!

*After the above period, we will 
hold the next "Mysterious Ritual Gacha" 
as soon as we are ready.
*Please note that the period 
may change.

Thank you for your continued support for
"Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle".

announcements.summary:
New SSR character that can Dokkan Awaken to LR!!
Also pay close attention to the new category "All Out"!
announcements.title: Dokkan Festival Held!

bodies.description:
{center:begin}{size:25}New SSR {outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00} "Super Saiyan God SS Goku &
Super Saiyan God SS Vegeta" {color}{outline} capable of
{color : #FF9900}Do{color}{color : #FFCC00}kk{color}{color : #FFCC00}an {color} {color : #FFFF00} Aw{color}{color : #CCFF00}ak{color}{color :#33FF00}en{color}{color : #00FFCC}in{color}{color : #00BFFF}g {color} up to {color : #FF3300} L{color}{color : #FF5F17}R {color} is here!!{size}

{size:23}The above characters leader skills
strengthen the new category
{color: #FF9900} "All out" {color} and fellows
in the {color: #00CCFF} "Joined Foces" {color} category!!

Furthermore, if you Dokkan Awaken up to LR,
you can activate active skills by meeting
{color: #FFFF00}the conditions during the battle!!{color}{size}{center}

{size: 25}{outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00}● New SSR character{color}{outline}{size}
{outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00} "Super Saiyan God SS Goku &
Super Saiyan God SS Vegeta" {color}{outline}
 capable of {color : #FF9900}Do{color}{color : #FFCC00}kk{color}{color : #FFCC00}an {color} {color : #FFFF00} Aw{color}{color : #CCFF00}ak{color}{color :#33FF00}en{color}{color : #00FFCC}in{color}{color : #00BFFF}g {color} up to {color : #FF3300} L{color}{color : #FF5F17}R {color} is here!!

{size: 25}{outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00}● Dokkan Awakening{color}{outline}{size}
[Saiyans Challenging the Strongest] Super Saiyan God SS Goku
& Super Saiyan God SS Vegeta awaken to LR with awakening
medal that can be acquired in the super fierce battle event
"Release Your Full Power! Warriors Aiming to Be the Strongest"!!

[Efforts in Battle] Krillin can also
Dokkan Awaken to the limit break UR!!

{size: 25}{outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00}● About Extra "coins"{color}{outline}{size}
Every time you use 5 Dragon Stones in this 
Gacha,you can get 1 "DOKKAN FEST COIN"!

The acquired "DOKKAN FEST COIN" can be
exchanged for characters in the lineup
at the Exchange Shop!

Check the required number of "DOKKAN FEST COIN" and
details of the target character at the Exchange Shop!

*Various "coins" that you earn
will be sent to the gift box.
*For other details about various "coins", please 
refer to the separately announced news about 
various "coins" that can be acquired as a bonus of Gacha".

{size: 25}{outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00}● Holding period{color}{outline}{size}
2020/6/30(Tue) 14:00
 ~ 2020/7/16(Thu) 16:59!!

{color: #FFFF00}*If information such as "Dokkan Awakening", 
"Category", and "Transformation" is not displayed
normally, it may be improved by restarting
the application or clearing the cache.{color}
*The 10th consecutive gasha will be the SSR guarenteed.
{size:20}*Skills that specify a specific character name may be 
excluded even if the characters that will appear in
the future are not listed as being excluded.{size}
*Since we have adjusted the line-up of characters 
that appear for each Gacha, please check from the 
"Appearance Character Provision Ratio" at the 
top left of the Gacha screen.
*Please note that the
period may change.

Thank you for your continued support for
"Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle".

announcements.summary:
A lot of new fierce battle events and extreme Z battles!
Many events related to Tanabata are held!
announcements.title:
Shine in heaven!
Tanabata Dokkan Campaign

bodies.description:
{center: begin}{size: 28}{color: #FFFFCC}{outline: #FF3399, 2}Shine in heaven!{outline}{color} 
{color: #81F7F3}{outline: #00BFFF, 2}Tanabata {outline}{color}{color: #F2F5A9}{outline: #FF00FF, 2} DOKKAN {outline}{color}{outline: #58ACFA, 2} campaign{outline}is held!!{size}

{size: 23}During the campaign period, new fierce
battle events, extreme Z battles, story
events and other events that you can
not miss will be held one after another!!

Two more
{color: #FFFF00}Dokkan festivals {color} have arrived!

{outline: #FF8000, 2}Super Saiyan God SS Goku
& Super Saiyan God SS Vegeta{outline}
who can Dokkan awaken to LR are very powerful!!

At the {color: #00FFFF}{outline: #0000FF, 2} Tanabata Dokkofest {outline}{color} scheduled to be
held from 7/7 (Tue.), {outline: #FF3333, 2} Gogeta {outline} and {outline: #01DF01, 2} Vejitto {outline},
which appeared on the 5th anniversary,
will appear again!!

In addition, there are {color: #00FF00} 77 different units{color}
to pick, where you can recruit your
favorite units by exchanging with the
hidden treasure {outline: #FF00FF,2} "Wish Strip 3" {outline} and the
{color: #FFFF00}Porunga Dragon Ball campaign{color}!!

Let's play Dokkan's
upcoming amazing
campaign Tanabata!!{size}{center}

Tanabata Dokkan mission first half

bodies.description:
From Monday, June 29th, the following updates
were made at the Fortune-telling Baba Exchange Center.

We have updated the maximum number of exchanges for LR
[The EvilSorcerer and The King of the Demon Realm]
Babidi & Dabura exchanging with the 
treasure "Battlefield Memory".

Before update: Maximum number of exchanges is 1
{color: #FFFF00}After renewal: Up to 2 times can be exchanged{color}

*The number of exchanges is not reset.
*If the updated contents are not displayed, it may be
improved by restarting the application or clearing the cache.
*Please note that the products at the exchange
office may changen without prior notice.

Thank you for your continued support for 
"Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle".

announcements.summary:
*Added on June 17 (Wed)
This bug has been fixed.
announcements.title:
Defects in transformation conditions
for specific characters

bodies.description:
{color: #FFFF00}2020/6/17(Wed) 14:00{color}

Thank you for playing
Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle.

This bug has been fixed.

As an apology for this problem,
we will send one "Dragon Stone" to all users.

▼Dragon Stone Receiving Period
2020/6/17(Wed) Sequential distribution
 ～2020/7/1(Wed) 23:59
* "Dragon Stone" will be distributed to the present box.

We apologize for any inconvenience this
may have caused to our users.

Thank you for your continued support for
"Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle".

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

Thank you for using Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle.

We have confirmed the following defects under the 
transformation conditions of [Heroic Warrior] Gohan (Future).

▼変身条件
After the 4th turn from the start of the battle, if the 
character with "Trunks" in the name (excluded kid, 
and GT) is on the team when HP is 58% or more, he 
will transform

▼不具合内容
{size: 20}[Pride of Humans] Super Saiyan Trunks (Future) & Mai (Future) {size}
are not transformed into "Super Saiyan Gohan(Future)"
even if the conditions are met while being organized in the team.

We will inform you about this matter in the notification
in the application as soon as the correction is 
completed.

We also plan to inform you of the
apology for this matter at a later date.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have
caused to our users.

Thank you for your continued support for
"Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle".

announcements.summary:
In commemoration of achieving 1st place in the store ranking,
30 dragon stones and Potential orbs given as gifts!!
announcements.title: Celebration! 1st place in App Store!!

bodies.description:
{center:begin}{size: 44}{outline : #FF3300, 3}1{outline}{outline : #FF9900, 3}s{outline}{outline : #FFFF00, 3}t{outline}{outline : #CCFF00, 3}P{outline}{outline :#33FF00, 3}l{outline}{outline : #00FFCC, 3}a{outline}{outline : #0099FF, 3}c{outline}{outline : #6666FF, 3}e{outline}{outline : #9966FF, 3}!!{outline}{size}

{size: 24}Thanks to everyone spending money
"Dragon Ball Z: Dokkan Battle" has
hit number 1 in the IOS app store!
At the top!!{size}

{size: 23}We would like to express our sincere gratitude.

To celebrate hitting 1st place in the store rankingr
the following items will get gifted
to all users{size}{center}

▼ Rewardss
{outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00}30「Dragon Stones」{color}{outline}
{outline: #FF3300, 2}3000 STR Potential Orbs{outline} 
{color:#FFFF00}5 Turtle Shells (Platinum) of each type{color}
{color:#99FFFF}One Mr. Satan statue (Diamond) {color}

*Breakdown of potential orbs
1800 (Small) 
1100 (Medium) 
100 (Large) 
3000 total 

▼Receiving period
2020/6/18(Thu)
 ~ 2020/7/2(Thu) 23:59
*It will be distributed to the present box.

We would like to thank all users for their support 
That we were able to achieve first place in the store
We would like to thank you again

Based on the reaction from everyone,
We hope that all our users will enjoy it
The team will continue to do their best

We will contimnue to work on "Dragon Ball Z: Dokkan Battle"
Thank you.

- Items that can be exchanged with Trade Pts. will be updated
after a certain period of time, or can be updated immediately
by consuming a Dragon Stone.

- The items up for trade are selected randomly.

- Initially, only a few items are available for trade. 
Use Trade Pts. to unlock more item slots. 
The more item slots unlocked, the higher 
the chance for you to find the items you're after!

- There is a rare chance of finding precious items 
or discounts!

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= How to Earn Trade Pts. ={size}{color}{outline}

- Characters or items can be exchanged for Trade Pts.

-  The amount of Trade Pts. you get from exchanges 
depends on the characters or items you offer.
In addition, please be aware that {color: #FF3333}characters or items
cannot be retrieved once they are exchanged{color}.

- Please note that Baba won't accept all items.

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Use Zeni to Trade ={size}{color}{outline}

- There are also items than can be purchased with Zeni 
at Baba's Shop.

- After you purchase a certain item with Zeni, it will be 
restocked after a certain period of time.

- The items that can be purchased with Zeni rarely change.

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Use Treasure Items to Trade ={size}{color}{outline}

- There are also items that can be exchanged with 
Treasure Items at Baba's Shop.

- Treasure Items can be obtained from the maps of 
stages after Area 16, "Reunited", in "Quest"
or from certain events.

- Certain items that can be exchanged with 
Treasure Items are only available for a limited time.

- New Treasure Items can be added at any time.

- You can switch between different Treasures by swiping
left or right under the "Treasure" tab at Baba's Shop.

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Tips on Baba's Shop ={size}{color}{outline}

- Baba's Shop is a place where you can
exchange things you don't need for Trade Pts.
then purchase things you do want with the points!

- If you happen to collect more Awakening Medals or items
than you need, exchange them for Trade Pts. at Baba's Shop.

- Try your luck at Baba's Shop if you miss your chance
to collect certain Awakening Medals in events.
They might appear in Baba's Shop for trade.
Keep an eye on the update timer for new stock!

- The more slots you unlock in Baba's Shop,
the higher the probability you will find the items you need!

{color: #FF3333}* Please note that the pricing in Zeni and Trade Pts. are
subject to change without prior warning.{color}

announcements.summary: The new SSR "Super Saiyan God Goku" has arrived

bodies.description: {size: 25}{outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00}● Featured character{color}{outline}{size}

Awakening medals required for Dokkan Awakening 
can be acquired at the following events!!

・Fierce Battle Event 「Beyond God - The Ultimate Secret」
・Fierce Battle Event 「The One Beyond God Descends! 
 Ultra Instinct」!!
・Fierece Battle Event「The Invincible Strongest of the Strong」

{size: 25}{outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00}●About extra "coins"{color}{outline}{size}
Every time you use 5 Dragon Stones in this Gacha
You can get 1 "Legendary Summon Coin"!!

The acquired "Legendary Summon Coin" can be 
exchanged for the character of your choice at 
the Baba Treasure Exchange!!

Check the required number of "Legendary Advent Coins" 
and the details of the target character at the
at the Hidden Exchange!!

*Summon "coins" that you get 
awarded will be sent to the gift box.
*For other details on various "coins", please refer 
 to the separately announced news "About various "coins" 
	hat can be acquired as a bonus for Gasha".

{size: 25}{outline: #FF0000, 2}{color: #FFFF00}● Holding period{color}{outline}{size}
2020/6/16(火) 17:00
 〜 2020/7/2(木) 16:59!!

{color: #FFFF00}*If information such as "Dockan Awakening", 
"Category", and "Development" is not displayed 
normally, it may be improved by restarting the 
application or clearing the cache.{color}
 *The 10th consecutive gacha will be the SSR confirmation.
{size:20}*Skills that specify a specific character name 
may be excluded even if characters that will 
appear in the future are not listed as excluded.{size}
*Since we have adjusted the line-up of characters 
that appear for each Gasha, please check 
from the "Appearance Character Proportion" on 
the upper left of the Gacha screen.
the upper left of the Gacha *Please note that 
the period may change. screen.

Thank you for your continued support for 
"Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle".

announcements.summary:
Tons of the STA-Restoring Item, "Aged Meat", and 
Keys that can be used at the Portal of Memories 
will be sent to all players.
announcements.title: Aged Meat and Key Distribution!

bodies.description:
Dear Players, 

Thank you for your continuous support for 
Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle! 
As a token of gratitude, the following items 
will be distributed to all players.

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Distribution List ={size}{color}{outline}

- Story Key x30
- Challenge Key x30
- Z-Battle Key x15
- Aged Meat (S) x15
- Aged Meat (M) x5
{display:except_eventkagi}{display}

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Distribution Period ={size}{color}{outline}

4/20 (Mon)  00:00 ~ 6/29 (Mond) 23:59

 We hope you continue to enjoy playing
Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle!

announcements.title:
The Wallpaper Feature 
Is Now Available!

bodies.description:
Stay tuned for more upcoming wallpapers!

* Please navigate the path "Menu --> Wallpaper Settings" 
and check the "How to Use" page for more details.

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Wallpaper Claiming Period ={size}{color}{outline}

Permanently available starting from 2019/8/19 (Mon) 21:00 PST

* Caution: Event Times in Dokkan Battle are listed in Pacific 
Standard Time (PST) instead of Pacific Daylight Time (PDT).

We hope you continue to enjoy playing 
Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle!

announcements.summary:
Use "Fighting Legend: Goku Ticket" to 
recruit SR or SSR Goku to your team!
announcements.title:
Fighting Legend: Goku 
Ticket Summon!

bodies.description:
{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Fighting Legend: Goku Ticket ={size}{color}{outline}

One Summon Ticket can be used to perform 
a Single-Summon, and five Summon Tickets 
can be used to perform a Multi-Summon!

Obtain Summon Tickets through the missions of
the ongoing event "Fighting Legend: Goku",
an event of extreme difficulty!

* You can recruit 5 characters by performing 
a Multi-Summon.

* Performing a Multi-Summon will not guarantee you 
an SSR character.

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Character That Can 
Be Awakened into LR ={size}{color}{outline}

{color: #00CC00}[Quiet Grit] Goku{color}

* The character above is not a featured character.

* Please note that other than the character listed above,
other characters that can be Dokkan Awakened into LR
will not be available in this summon.

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Event Period ={size}{color}{outline}

{color: #FFFF00}Permanently available starting from 2019/10/2 (Wed) 22:30 PST{color}

* Caution: Event Times in Dokkan Battle are listed in Pacific
Standard Time (PST) instead of Pacific Daylight Time (PDT).

* Please tap the "Character Summon Rates" in
the top-left corner of the Summon page to check
the complete list of available characters.

* The list of available characters of this summon
will not be updated in the future.

* This summon will not be displayed on the "Summon" page
if you do not have a "Fighting Legend: Goku Ticket".

* If you cannot see information such as "Dokkan 
Awakening", "Category" or "Growth" in the game, 
try restarting the application or tap on the "Cache 
Clear" button on the Title Screen.

* Please note that the event content and dates are
subject to change without prior warning.

We hope you continue to enjoy playing
Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle!

announcements.summary:
"Coin", the Treasure Item obtainable through 
Summon Events, is here! Check out information on 
how to use Coins and their types in this announcement!
announcements.title:
Information on the 
Treasure Item "Coin"

bodies.description:
Obtain the Treasure Item "{color: #FFFF00}Coin{color}"
in certain Summon Events!

Collect {color: #FFFF00}a certain number of identical Coins{color}
to recruit certain characters at Baba's Shop!

{color: #FFFF00}Three types of "Coin"{color} are available, and
the type of Coin(s) obtained depends on
the type of the Summon Event!
Please check the following for details on
the Treasure Item "Coin"!

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Treasure Item "Coin" ={size}{color}{outline}

{color: #FFFF00}Every 5 Dragon Stones consumed{color} in 
Summon Events that require the consumption of
Dragon Stones will reward you with {color: #FFFF00}1 "Coin"{color} that
corresponds to the type of the Summon Event!

You can recruit corresponding characters at {color: #FFFF00}Baba's Shop{color}
once you have collected a certain number of Coins!

* The number and type of "Coin" required differ 
among characters.

The Coins you still have after the Summon Event ends
will be retained and can be used with the same type of
Coin next time a Summon Event of the same type
is available.

* The Coin(s) obtained will be sent to your Gift Box.

* Please navigate the following path to check
the number of Coins you have: 
"Team" > "Items" > "Treasure".

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Types of "Coin" ={size}{color}{outline}

{color: #FFFF00}1. Dokkan Festival Coin{color}
Corresponding Summon Event: Dokkan Festival

* Including Dokkan Festival, Super (or Extreme) Dokkan 
Festival, Extreme Z Dokkan Festival, etc.

{color: #FFFF00}2. Legendary Summon Coin{color}
Corresponding Summon Event: Legendary Summon

{color: #FFFF00}3. Summon Coin{color}
Corresponding Summon Event:
Summon Events that do not belong to the above two types.

* Including Type Summons, Category Summons,
Mysterious Ritual Summon, etc.

{size: 24}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}= Obtainable Number of "Coin" ={size}{color}{outline}

Example 1:
{color: #FFFF00}1 corresponding Coin{color} can be obtained by performing
a Single-Summon that requires {color: #FFFF00}5 Dragon Stones{color}.

Example 2:
{color: #FFFF00}10 corresponding Coins{color} can be obtained by performing
a Multi-Summon that requires {color: #FFFF00}50 Dragon Stones{color}.

Example 3:
{color: #FFFF00}6 corresponding Coins{color} can be obtained by performing
a Multi-Summon that requires {color: #FFFF00}30 Dragon Stones{color}.

Example 4:
{color: #FFFF00}No Coins{color} can be obtained by performing a Summon
that {color: #FFFF00}does not require any Dragon Stones{color}.

{color: #FF9900}- About Characters That Can be Recruited with "Coin"{color}

Characters who can be recruited with "Coin"
at Baba's Shop include {color: #FFFF00}featured characters{color} of 
ongoing Summon Events and {color: #FFFF00}[Mysterious Ritual] Elder Kai{color}.

Characters who can be recruited at Baba's Shop 
will be updated simultaneously with the Summon Events.

The exchange period of characters who can be
recruited with "Coin" can be checked at Baba's Shop.

* Please note that the number of Coins obtained
and related settings at Baba's Shop are subject to 
change in the future.

We hope you continue to enjoy playing
Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle!

announcements.summary: Set off on the journey of becoming a legend! The powerful fusion warrior that reached the LR realm is here!
announcements.title: LR Super Saiyan God SS Vegetto Arrives!

bodies.description:
{center : begin}Achieve the mission and collect the 
awakening medal{color: #FFCC66}「Potara」{color} Dokkan Awaken
{color : #FF3300}[Determined Fusion] Vegetto{color} to [LR]!!

Awaken {color : #FF3300} [Engraved Strength] Vegetto{color} to a maximum of 
Lv.120 [UR] and exceeding the limit!{center}

{center : begin}By further Dokkan awakening, 
you will reach{color : #FF3300} [LR]{color} and increase the maximum to:{color : #9966FF} Lv.150!!{color}{center}

{center : begin}{size : 25}Overcome the trials and
get the power of an LR!!{size}{center}

{size: 25}{color: #FFFF00}{outline: #FF0000, 2}● Notes{outline}{color}{size}
{color: #FFFF00}There is a limit to the number of awakening
medals "Potara" and [Determined Fusion] vejitto.
Please be careful when converting to sale or exchange pt.{color}

*If the mission description does not say "Include 
friends", the characters of friends are not included in 
the clearing conditions.

*If a specific character is specified in the mission, only 
the characters with the same name except two can 
meet the conditions.

▼Example: Goku is organized and cleared
○ [Determined Defender] Goku
× [Innocent Challenger] Goku (Youth)r
× [Supreme Warrior Awakened] Super Saiyan Goku

Thank you for your continued support for
"Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle".
